channel.title: Hello im startin server and need help
channel.description:
hi im startin a server and i want to make some things on it and theres some things i dont get.
atNPC: what is this? how do i add commands? how do i get more npc? how to i start it up so other people can join? how do i make admin? how do i make mod? can some one do codeing for me? or show me how to do codeing? can i change stats form my stuff in serevr pack? please help thankyou steven
